pages.text: $(li)The Lobster Tail is an eatable item that can be used to tame $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/mimic_octopus)Mimic Octopus$(/l).$(br)$(li)This item can be used to breed $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/mantis_shrimp)Mantis Shrimps$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/platypus)Platypus$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be used to make a $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/seagull)Seagull$(/l) to help you to find a $(l)Buried Treasure$().

$(li)This item may be cooked in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l), $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/smoker)Smoker$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/campfire)Campfire$(/l).$(br)$(li)Cooked Lobster Tail satisfies three times more than a Lobster Tail.$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/lobster)Lobsters$(/l) may drop this item upon death.
